articleplaceholder-desc:
{{desc|what=extension|name=ArticlePlaceholder|url=https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:ArticlePlaceholder}}
<nowiki>{{WBREPONAME}}</nowiki> is a variable of the repository name of Wikidata (it has replaced the string 'Wikidata').
articleplaceholder-abouttopic-intro:
Intro paragraph shown on Special:AboutTopic.

<nowiki>{{WBREPONAME}}</nowiki> is a variable of the repository name of Wikidata (it has replaced the string 'Wikidata').
articleplaceholder-abouttopic-entityid: Text to encourage the user to enter an item id.
articleplaceholder-abouttopic-no-entity-: Error message in case of an invalid item id.
articleplaceholder-abouttopic-create-art: Title of the popup window encouraging the user to create a new article.
Label of the article page title input in the 'Create article' popup.
Used as an error message in the 'Create article', if the article title wasn't supplied.
articleplaceholder-abouttopic-create-emt: Label on create new empty article
articleplaceholder-abouttopic-translate-:
Label of the source language input in the 'Translate article' popup.
{{Identical|Source language}}
Label of the Translate button to start translating the article/item.
articleplaceholder-abouttopic-article-ex: Error to indicate the given article title already exists
articleplaceholder-search-header: Header in the search for the results of Special:AboutTopic generated pages
articleplaceholder-createpage-alreadyexi:
Description message that the page, the user want to create, already exists, explaining, that the user should choose another title.
* $1 - The currently used title
articleplaceholder-createpage-notitlepro: Description message on [[Special:CreateTopicPage]], which explains, that no title was given and the user should provide the title of the page to create.
articleplaceholder-createpage-invalidtit: Description message on [[Special:CreateTopicPage]], which explains, that an invalid title was given and the user should provide a valid title of the page to create.
